title: World Modern Agriculture Technology: High-Tech Harvesters Transforming Global Farming

tasks.task: Demonstrate operation of soil preparation, planting, and harvesting machines for carrots and potatoes.
subtasks: Drive soil preparation machine to till and condition the land.
Operate planting machine to sow seeds at proper spacing and depth.
Adjust machine settings for optimal seed distribution and cover with soil.
Use carrot harvesting machine to lift roots from soil without damage.
Transfer harvested carrots onto conveyor belt for cleaning and sorting.

tasks.task: Exhibit use of a corn harvester.
subtasks: Operate cutting blades to sever corn stalks at base.
Transport corn plants via conveyor system to kernel separator.
Utilize separator to distinguish kernels from cobs and manage debris.
Ensure不间断作业 and efficient processing over large cornfield areas.

tasks.task: Exhibit operation of soil preparation, planting, and carrot harvesting machines.
subtasks: Drive soil preparation machine for land conditioning.
Use planting machine with seed hopper for precise sowing.
Adjust digging blades on harvesting machine to lift carrots.
Transfer harvested carrots onto conveyor for cleaning.

tasks.task: Demonstrate operation of a corn harvester.
subtasks: Activate cutting blades to harvest corn stalks efficiently.
Guide corn plants through conveyor system to kernel separator.
Manage kernel collection and discard stalks properly.
